body.name: TOY Life Wooden Animal Puzzles for Toddlers 1-3, 12 Piece Puzzles for Kids Ages 2-4, Toddler Puzzles Ages 1-3, Montessori Puzzles for 1 Year Old, Baby Puzzles, Learning Toy for Toddlers 1-3 Year Old
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 21 hrs 34 mins
features: 🐶 SAFE LEARINING WOODEN PUZZLE FOR TODDLER : Designed with the toddler in mind, this wooden puzzles toy is made of high-quality natural wood , which is smooth, rounded, and no splintery edges and finished with bright colors non-toxic paint. It's very easy and safe for your little one to touch and grasp pieces with smooth edge. Best gift for toddler and 1 2 3 Years Old Boys and Girls.

🦁 12 DIFFERENT SHAPE WITH BRIGHT COLORS: This wooden puzzle comes with 8 different Shape with bright colors, including yellow duck, frog, dog, monkey,lion, giraffe, cow, turtle, elephant, crab, sea horse, fish. Every puzzle is so bright that it is very easy to attract the attention of your little one and very great for cognitive learning.

🦒 DURABLE AND LARGE PART: Made of environmental friendly solid wood, this wooden puzzle is so durable that your little one can enjoy it for a long time. Each part of this wooden puzzles is in a right size for tiny fingers to grasp and big enough to avoid swallowing the puzzles.

🐸 GREAT EDUCATIONAL TOY FOR TODDLER At TOY Life we are dedicated to developing educational toys that will help support your child in all areas of development. This wooden animal puzzles is very great for cognitive learning. It can help with so many skills including eye-hand coordination, early math skills, problem solving. Besides, you can practice your little one about colors shapes and animal body parts.

🐄 TOY LIFE GUARANTEE: Buy with confidence. If anything happens to your toy within the first 12 months of owning it, we will replace it at no charge to you. Just contact Toy Life directly through the Amazon message system.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These puzzles are good quality. The pieces are easy for my 2 year-old to manipulate. I like that there is a variety of levels of complexity, as well as shape lines on the base of the puzzle. Great set for children just beginning to learn jigsaw puzzles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was a great product and definitely sturdy made. Colors and great and the pieces are chunky enough for her to hold. Only 5 or so pieces to each puzzle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My kids love this and is supper pretty easy for my toddler to figure out! Pretty sturdy and not flimsy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The quality of the paint isn't 100%, but they're cute and my 1 1/2 year old loves them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice little puzzles with a range of 3 to 5 pieces each. They come individually wrapped if you want to split up the set and give them out. Purchased for a 2 year old and a 3 year old and I think they'll enjoy them. They also come with a 12 month warranty which is interesting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the grandkids
reviews.reviewText: I got them for my granddaughter for Christmas, who’s 18months, and my 3 yr old grandson was sitting with her playing with them and showing her how to do them. Super cute.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Ordered these for my 2 year old. First I got the transportation set . The pieces were a bit smaller and the puzzles were challenging at first. He got the hang of it and then I ordered the animal set. The animal set has bigger pieces and the puzzles are a bit easier because of the design. I should have ordered the animal set first because of that since we are just starting to do puzzles now. If you are purchasing for a younger child, I would recommend the animal puzzles first because if these. However he likes all the puzzles regardless. There is a bit of a learning curve with all wood puzzles because they must be clicked together from the top rather than sliding together. I have attached a photo for comparison Would buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Dangerously small pieces for 3 and under!!
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful colored wood pieces,sturd,would rate 5 stars, but pieces can easily be put on toddler mouths! (tried on toddlers 18 months and 2 yrs)May be suitable for 3+
